description.en:
Having creampie sex with an enrolled schoolgirl in the countryside!?
Upon starting his job at a rural school, the protagonist is somehow reverse-raped by a busty young girl named Yuzu-chan...
Since then he indulges in bareback sex with Yuzu-chan...!?

(Source: DLsite)

Multi-work series list:
1.) CountrySex / Inakax (田舎ックス)

2.) Outdoor Sex & Classroom Lewdness Episode / Osoto de Aokan & Kyoushitsu Ecchi Hen (お外でアオカン＆教室えっち編)

3.) Sweaty in Public Baths and Private Sauna / Koushuu Yokujou to Koshitsu Sauna de Asedaku Ecchi Hen (公衆浴場と個室サウナで汗だくえっち編)

4.) Skinship with my cousin, Anzu-chan 3P-Hen / Itoko no Anzu-chan to Nakayoshi 3P Hen (イトコの杏ちゃんとなかよし3P編)
4.1) Anzu Special Chapter / Anzu Tokubetsu Hen (杏特別編) 
- *Soushuuhen / Omnibus version special chapter*

5.) Lovey-Dovey Overnight Stay & Sex Until Morning / Icha Love Otomari & Asa made Ecchi Hen (いちゃラブお泊り&朝までえっち編)

6.) Kawara de Okugai Ecchi & Inemuri Suikan Hen (河原で屋外えっち&居眠り睡姦編)

Note:
The Soushuuhen (総集編) "omnibus" compilation contains parts 1-4 + a special chapter.
description.ja: 田舎で現役J○と中出しH!?赴任早々、巨乳娘の柚ちゃんに逆レイプされてしまった主人公は、その日から柚ちゃんとの生Hに没頭するようになってしまい…!?
